verbose_text: STAT3 can be phosphorylated by the stimulation of upstream receptors and/or nonreceptor kinases including EGFR XREF_BIBR, IL-6 / GP130 and Janus kinases (JAKs) XREF_BIBR, and SRC family kinases XREF_BIBR.
evidence: STAT3 can be phosphorylated by the stimulation of upstream receptors and/or nonreceptor kinases including EGFR  XREF_BIBR , IL-6/GP130 and Janus kinases (JAKs)  XREF_BIBR , and SRC family kinases
